short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore a new line of code every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Code Line Daily is a project made by Silvestar BistroviÄ‡ in his free time. The goal of the project is to highlight the simplicity in the code, the essence, if you will: a single line of code.
